mapper.sql: adGroupId, campaignId, adId, sku, asin, state, profileid, opttime
mapper.insert:
replace into t_amz_adv_productads ( campaignId, adId, adGroupId, sku, asin, state, profileid, opttime) values
( #{adv.campaignid,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{adv.adid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{adv.adgroupid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{adv.sku,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{adv.asin,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{adv.state,jdbcType=CHAR},#{adv.profileid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{adv.opttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
